org.trimou.engine.config

Interface ConfigurationExtension

  • All Superinterfaces:
    WithPriority
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConfigurationExtension

    public interface ConfigurationExtension
extends WithPriority
    Configuration extensions are automatically loaded during the engine initialization, provided the ServiceLoader mechanism is not disabled.

    Extensions with higher priority are registered first.

    Author:
    Martin Kouba
    See Also:
    MustacheEngineBuilder.omitServiceLoaderConfigurationExtensions()
